channel.title: Black Mesa counts as "running" after Hammer and occasionally the game client close
channel.description:
Often after closing Hammer, and occasionally after closing the game, Steam will continue to register Black Mesa as "running", preventing BM and any other game from being launched until Steam is forcibly killed in the task manager.
As much as I would love to be able to claim I have over 800 hours logged in Black Mesa, at least half of that time is a result of this bug happening and me not noticing until later.
